title: El Capitan
content:
Hello! My Mac is old. It uses El Capitan 10.11.6 and cannot be updated any more.

I updated to the latest version of Firefox. Big Mistake. It asked if I wanted to keep the old copy and opted to not to. Now, no matter what I try to download nothing works. I am stuck. Can you help?

Thank you!

title: REPLY RECEIVED TO MY HELP QUESTION.  HAVE TROUBLE TO FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS I RECEIVED.
content:
'I GOT THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IN MY EMAIL IN REPLY TO MY HELP QUESTION I HAD POSTED IN THE FORUM, BUT I CANNOT FIND MY "-- FORUM POST --! PLEASE HELP ME FIND IT,THANKS.

This is that message: __________________________________________________________________________________________________________ In order to better assist you with your issue please provide us with a screenshot. If you need help to create a screenshot, please see How do I create a screenshot of my problem?

Once you've done this, attach the saved screenshot file to your forum post by clicking the Browse... button below the Post your reply box. This will help us to visualize the problem. ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ 1) EXPAND ALL, 2021-12-16 at 18.10.08.png 2) REPAIR TEXT IS GRAYED, 2021-12-16 .png 3) REPAIR TEXT on TOOLBAR also greyed, 2021-12-16 .png

title: Why is Firefox not allowing me to use PayPal Pay Now @ PaperWishes?
content: Firefox is blocking my ability to use PayPal Pay Now on PaperWishes only. It says there is a Popup problem. PaperWishes is a known vender. I have been using them for 20 years or more. So why now is Firefox objecting to them?
